item.content:encoded: [services.add db service_label='DB Services' post_type='db_service' desc='database services' /] [services.add common service_label='Common Service' post_type='common_service' desc='Common services'/] [services.add form_control service_label='Form Control Service' post_type='form_control' desc='Form Control Service' /] [services.add form_control2 service_label='Form Control 2 Service' post_type='form_control2' desc='Form Control 2 Service' /] [services.add ui service_label='UI Services' post_type='ui_service' desc='UI Services' /] [services.add notification_service service_label='Notification Services' post_type='notification_service' desc='Notification Services' /] [services.add form service_label='Forms Service' post_type='forms' desc='Common Forms' /] [services.add aw_form service_label='AW Form Service' post_type='aw_form' desc='AW Form Service' /] [services.add search_service service_label='Search Service' post_type='search_service' desc='search services' /] [services.add sample_service service_label='Sample App Service' post_type='sample_service' desc='Sample App Service' /]

item.title: 404-layout
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
item.content:encoded:
This is somewhat embarrassing, isn’t it?

It seems we can’t find what you’re looking for. Perhaps searching can help.

item.title: scripts
item.dc:creator: sapna
item.content:encoded:
<link rel="shortcut icon" type="image/png" href="[env.get settings.opt-favicon /]"/> //** this favicon for site **// <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.typekit.net/mfv8kad.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="[aw2.get url.home /]site-skin/css/awesome-css"> //** It include awesome CSS **// <link rel="stylesheet" href="//code.jquery.com/ui/1.12.1/themes/base/jquery-ui.css">
<script type='text/javascript'> aw2=new Array(); aw2['homeurl']="[aw2.get url.home /]" aw2['cdn']="[env.get settings.cdn /]" aw2['path']="[app.get path /]/" </script> <script src='[php.site_url /]/awesome-js/js/all-js' defer></script> //** It include all-js file of Awesome JS App **//
<script type="spa/axn" axn="ga.load" ga_tracking_id="[env.get settings.opt-ga-code /]"></script>

item.title: blog-content-layout
item.dc:creator: sapna

item.title: footer
item.dc:creator: wpoid_web

item.title: header
item.dc:creator: wpoid_web
item.content:encoded:
[style.css] html{ -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; } html{ overflow-x:hidden; &.menu-is-open{ overflow:hidden; height:100vh; width:100vw; } } .background_ovelay { #background_ovelay{ position: fixed; top:0; left:0; right:0; bottom:0; overflow: hidden; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); z-index: 25; transition:all 0.5s ease; } } .z-index-max{ z-index:999999; } .fa-remove{ &:before{ content: "\e915" !important; } } nav{ &.navbar{ border:0px solid transparent; border-radius: 0px; &.desktop_menu{ .sub-menu { position:absolute; top:45px; padding:0; min-width: auto; left:0; box-shadow: -1px 13px 15px rgba(0,0,0,.1); a{ font-size:22px !important; color:#000; } } .menu-item-has-children:hover .sub-menu { display:block; max-height: 100vh; } .navbar-header{ width:9.5%; } .menu_wrapper { width:90.5%; } .navbar-nav>li>a{ margin-top:10px; padding-bottom:11px; background: initial; &:focus{ outline:none; } } .navbar-nav>li{ display: flex; height: 100%; align-items: center; } .primary_menu{ .navbar-collapse{ padding:0; margin-right:0px; } } } &.mobile_menu{ height:50px; position:fixed; left:0; right:0; top:-1px; transition: all 0.5s ease; .navbar-nav { margin: 0 -15px; } .sub-menu { display:none; li { list-style-type:none; padding-top:5px; padding-bottom:5px; padding-left:10px; } } .navtoggle button{ padding: 0; padding-right:10px; border:0; &:focus{ outline: none; } } .fa-bars{ font-size: 32px; } margin-bottom:0; .mobile-menu-height{ z-index:999; position:relative; } #mySidenav { position: absolute; width: 0; background: #fff; z-index: 50; right: 0; height: 100%; overflow-y:scroll; display: block; font-size:14px; font-family:@font-family; color:@gray-darker; transition: 300ms ease; transform: translateX(100%); overflow-y: scroll; &.open-menu{ transition: 300ms ease; transform: translateX(0%); width:80%; min-height: ~"calc(100vh - 49px)" !important; max-width:320px; } .navbar-nav>li>a{ padding-top:15px; padding-bottom:15px; padding: 10px 0px 10px 15px; } li{ > a{ z-index:1; font-size:@font-size-larger; font-family:@font-family; transition:300ms ease; } &.current-menu-item,&.current-menu-ancestor, &.current-menu-parent{ > a{ background-color:transparent ; transition:300ms ease; } } } } } } } .desktop_menu .sub-menu .sub-menu { left: 100% !important; top:0 !important; display:none; } .desktop_menu .sub-menu .menu-item-has-children:hover .sub-menu { display:block; } .desktop_menu .sub-menu li { list-style-type: none; min-width: auto; padding: 10px 20px 10px 20px; position:relative; background: #fff; border-bottom:1px solid #d4d3d8; } .desktop_menu ul.sub-menu li:first-child { padding-top: 13px; margin-top: 10px; } ul.sub-menu li:last-child { border-bottom:0px; } .desktop_menu .menu > li > .sub-menu > li a{ margin: 10px 15px 15px -2px; border-bottom: 2px solid transparent; color: #11324d !important; font-size:15px !important; font-weight:300; } .desktop_menu .menu > li > .sub-menu > li > a:hover, .desktop_menu .menu > li > .sub-menu > li a:hover::before { color: #f15f25 !important; } .desktop_menu .sub-menu > li a:after { height:0px !important; } .desktop_menu .menu > li > .sub-menu > li .sub-menu li > a:hover { color: #f15f25 !important; } .desktop_menu .sub-menu > .menu-item-has-children::before { content: "\e914"; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; position: absolute; top: 20px; right: 10px; transform: translateY(-50%); z-index: 5; font-family: 'Awesome-Icons' !important; } .mobile_menu .menu-item-has-children { position: relative; .down-caret{ font-size: 18px; position: absolute; right: 5px; z-index:9; padding:8px; } } #spinner { z-index:999999; } .mobile_menu .menu>li>.sub-menu { background:#FFF; padding-left: 30px; } .mobile_menu .menu>li>.sub-menu>li>.sub-menu { background:#FFF; padding-left: 30px; } .mobile_menu .menu>li>.sub-menu>li>.sub-menu .sub-menu { display:block; } .mobile_menu ul { padding-left: 0px; } .mobile_menu li { padding: 0px !important; border-bottom: 1px solid #f2f1f1; position: relative; } .mobile_menu li a { display:inline-block !important; padding: 10px 20px !important; color:#11324d !important; width:100%; } .mobile_menu .menu-item-has-children>a { color: #11324d !important; } .mobile_menu .menu>li>.sub-menu>li>.sub-menu .menu-item-has-children::after { content:''; border:0px; } .mobile_menu .menu>li>.sub-menu>li>.sub-menu .menu-item-has-children li { padding-left: 30px !important; } .mobile_menu .menu>li>.sub-menu>li>.sub-menu .menu-item-has-children li:first-child { border-top:1px solid #f2f1f1 !important; } i.icon { display: unset !important; width: auto !important; height: auto !important; line-height: 1 !important; vertical-align: middle !important; margin-left: unset !important; } .header-social-media { padding-top:14px; padding-bottom: 29px; a:hover i{ border-color:@brand-primary; transition:0.5s; } } .header-social-media i{ transition:0.5s; } .branch-contact a { position:relative; } .fade-data{ opacity:0; } nav.navbar.desktop_menu .navbar-nav > li > a{ color:#424242; font-size:16px; padding-bottom: 21px; font-weight:600; } nav.navbar.desktop_menu .navbar-nav > li { margin: 0 0 0 30px; position:relative; } .nav>li>a{ padding: 0; } .nav>li { position: static; } nav.navbar.desktop_menu .sub-menu{ z-index: 50; top: 49px; min-width: 215px; margin: 0 auto; max-height: 0; overflow: hidden; -webkit-transition: all 1s ease; -moz-transition: all 1s ease; -o-transition: all 1s ease; -ms-transition: all 1s ease; transition: all 1s ease; &:before{ width: 0; height: 0; border-left: 7px solid transparent; border-right: 7px solid transparent; border-bottom: 7px solid #fff; font-size: 0; line-height: 0; content: ''; position: absolute; top: 3px; left: 15px; } } .nav>li>a:hover, .nav>li>a:focus{ color:#f15f25 !important; background-color: transparent; } nav.navbar.desktop_menu .primary_menu ul#menu-menu-1 li:hover > a, nav.navbar.desktop_menu .primary_menu ul#menu-menu-1 li:active > a{ background: transparent; color:#f15f25; } @media only screen and (max-width:991px) { .navbar-collapse{ width:100%; } .navbar-nav, .navbar-nav>li { float: none; } nav.navbar.mobile_menu #mySidenav li > a { font-size: 14px; font-family: @font-family; } nav.navbar.mobile_menu .navbar-header img { height: 30px; } } @media only screen and (max-width:1024px) and (min-width:768px) and (orientation: portrait){ .navbar-collapse { width: 100%; } } .nav .open>a, .nav .open>a:hover, .nav .open>a:focus { background-color: transparent; } nav ul li .active { color:#c4351e; } nav.navbar.mobile_menu .navbar-nav > li > a, .mobile_menu .menu > li > .sub-menu > li a{ font-size:16px !important; } .desktop_menu .current-menu-item>a, .desktop_menu #menu-menu-1 .current-menu-parent>a, .desktop_menu #menu-menu-1 .current-menu-item>a{ color:#f15f25 !important; } .mobile_menu .current-menu-item>a, .mobile_menu #menu-menu-1 .current-menu-parent>a, .mobile_menu #menu-menu-1 .current-menu-item>a{ color:#f15f25 !important; } .logo-img img { transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; -o-transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; -ms-transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; } @media (min-width: 1200px) { .heighteffect{ height:100px; display:none; } } //** top nav menu css start here **// //** top nav menu css end here **// @media (min-width: 780px) { .stickyHeader { z-index: 9; position: fixed !important; background-color: white; top: 0; width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); } .stickyHeader .top-menu{ display:none !important; } .stickyHeader .logo-img img{ width:70%; } .stickyHeader .primary_menu{ margin-top:11px; } } @media screen and (-ms-high-contrast: active), (-ms-high-contrast: none) { .logo-img img { transition: 0s; -webkit-transition: 0s; -moz-transition: 0s; -o-transition: 0s; -ms-transition: 0s; } } @supports (-ms-ime-align: auto) { .logo-img img { transition: 0s; -webkit-transition: 0s; -moz-transition: 0s; -o-transition: 0s; -ms-transition: 0s; } } .cookie-notice-container span { display:block; margin-bottom:5px; } nav.navbar.desktop_menu .primary_menu #menu-menu-1>li{ >a:after{ content: ''; position: absolute; border-bottom: 3px solid #f15f25; width: 0px; bottom: 0; left: 0; min-width: 0px; transition: all .3s ease-in-out; } &.current-menu-parent>a:after,&.current-menu-item>a:after, &:hover>a:after{ min-width: 40px; width: 25%; } &.current-menu-parent>a, &:hover>{ color:#f15f25; } } .scrollUp { transform: translateY(-95px); } .contact-us-nav> a:before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0px; bottom: 10px; right: 0px; left: 0px; border: 2px solid #f15f25; } .contact-us-nav> a:hover::before{ background: #f15f25; border-color: #f15f25!important; z-index: -1; } .contact-us-nav.current-menu-item> a:before{ content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0px; bottom: 10px; right: 0px; left: 0px; background: #f15f25; border-color: #f15f25!important; z-index: -1; } @media only screen and (max-width:991px) { .contact-us-nav> a:before{ border:0px; } .contact-us-nav.current-menu-item> a:before,.contact-us-nav> a:hover::before{ background:#fff } } .nav>li.contact-us-nav>a:hover, .desktop_menu #menu-menu-1 .contact-us-nav.current-menu-item>a { color: #fff !important; @media only screen and (max-width:991px) { color:#c4351e !important; } } .nav>li.contact-us-nav>a{ padding-left:10px; padding-right:10px; margin-top: 0px !important; padding-top: 10px; } #menu-menu-1 .menu-item-has-children:before { content: "\e904"; font-family: 'awesome-icons'; speak: none; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-transform: none; line-height: 1; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; position: absolute; right: -15px; top: 13px; } nav.navbar.desktop_menu .primary_menu ul#menu-menu-1>li.contact-us-nav>a:after{ border:0px; } [/style.css]
[aw2.get menu] { "theme_location": "primary_menu_top", "echo":false, "walker":true } [/aw2.get]
[aw2.get menu] { "theme_location": "primary_navigation", "echo":false, "walker":true } [/aw2.get]
[aw2.get menu] { "theme_location": "primary_navigation", "echo":false, "walker":true } [/aw2.get]
[aw2.get menu] { "theme_location": "primary_menu_top", "echo":false, "walker":true } [/aw2.get]
